actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing members of Joint Committee on Printing and Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.

summary.text: Elects members to the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library. Makes the elections to the Joint Committee on Printing effective upon enactment of specified legislation which increases such committee's membership.

titles.title: A resolution electing members of Joint Committee on Printing and Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.
